= `private` `static` Class *jplex.components.menubar.MenuBarItem*  =

== Description ==
!MenuBar Item subclass

<tr><td> *Name* </td><td> *Description* </td><td> *Parameters* </td></tr>
<tr><td> __onClick_ </td><td>  Fires on item activation by click
Call the user custom function
If the item is a root element, just shows the submenu </td><td>   - `e <Event>`  <br/>  </td></tr>
<tr><td> __onMouseOver_ </td><td>  Fires when the mouse enters the item
The handlers are identical to those of the menu root </td><td>   - `e <Event>`  <br/>  </td></tr>
</table>
